full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify: F1700-231136

#### Project Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) invites qualified bidders to participate in the following opportunity:

* **Project Title**: Canadian Coast Guard Hangar Floor Coating
* **Number of Tender**: WS4027574769
* **Publication Date**: May 31, 2023
* **Closing Date**: June 16, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)

#### Scope of Work

The project consists of the removal and replacement of the existing helicopter maintenance-hangar concrete floor coating with a new epoxy floor coating system at the defined site.

#### Requirements

* The bidder must have experience in floor laying services, specifically epoxy floor coating systems.
* The bidder must be able to provide proof of qualifications and experience.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Additional Information

* The contract will be awarded based on the competitive process.
* The contract value will be determined based on the bid submitted by the successful bidder.
* The project is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns regarding the tender, please contact:

* Chris Morton (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [chris.morton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:chris.morton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: N/A
* Fax: N/A
* Address: N/A

#### Document Access

The tender documents can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery website.
* URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16450392?extsite=MTY0NTAzOTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
